headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS DUAL ION / FIVE THERMOCOUPLE GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Dual Ion/ Five Thermocouple Gauge Controller    Granville Phillips 307109
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 307109
Description Dual Ion/Five Thermocouple Gauge Controller/Process
Gauge Types Controlled Ion; Thermocouple
Cables Included No
Accessories


Cable between controller and the power supply included.

Gauges and gauge cables are not included, inquire, please.

Ion gauge cables see items 6799 or 179524

TC gauge compatible types: G-P 270006, Comptech TVT-6000, or Teledyne-Hastings DV-6M, DV-6R, DV-36, DV-20.

Other Information
  • Sequential Ion Gauge readout 1E-1 to 1E-9 Torr
  • Thermocouple bar graph readout 1E-3 to 1 Torr
  • 6 relay process control
  • BCD interface for gauge pressure, status and control
  • Analog pressure output


Dimensions and weight:

Control Unit

  • Width 241 mm 9.5 in
  • Height 89 mm (3.5 in.)
  • Depth 356 mm (14 in.) includes 76 mm (3 in.) for connectors and cables
  • Weight 3 kg (6.5 lb.)


Power Unit

  • Width 203 mm (8 in.)
  • Height 89 mm (3.5 in.)
  • Depth 330 mm (13 in.) includes 89 mm (3.5 in.) for connectors and cables
  • Weight 4 kg (8.5 lb.)
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 1.0 A 0.5 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
